website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable tinted moisturizer with sun protection and vegan ingredients that adds a light coverage that works well for most skin tones.
pros: Despite the low price, this tinted moisturizer has notable features, including SPF 20 and a formula that is cruelty-free and vegan
Contains vitamins and plant-based nutrients that moisturize skin
Blurs imperfections with more coverage than most tinted moisturizers
cons: Consumers with fair skin may find that even the lightest shade is too dark or orange

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Never had used e.l.f. products before but it was such a great price I thought I would try it. Love this product!! I live outside of PHX and I use this everyday. No redness or dryness. Smooth and soft. Great coverage too. Great find!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: justjet

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST! It offers great coverage with out looking like ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST! It offers great coverage with out looking like I am even wearing makeup.. Bonus that it has SPF, and EXTRA BONUS that it's CHEAP! I'd pay a lot more for this if I had to. NOTE: I apply some dark circle corrector (Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer) around my eyes first and then squirt the e.l.f. tinted moisturizer on the end of a makeup brush & apply over my eyes and then entire face. This product is great for evening skin tones out, but won't conceal anything too major. Blends extremely well with brush, but I haven't tried applying it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: NCamp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect consistency
customer_reviews.text: This is another Elf product that is great value and works as advertised. Goes on smoothly and nice color! Delivered as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Joyous

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, light coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is great for light coverage but you have to reapply and it does rub off on your phone or anything you get against your face
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than first aid beauty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I originally got first aid beauty because I love their products and it felt like moose, awful for my dry skin. This was perfect. Its moisturizing and gives a very light coverage but enough to tone down red areas without looking like I caked on make up. Wish I could buy more if they weren't add on now lol, but keeping them in my cart in case (:
customer_reviews.author: Newell Supur

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products
customer_reviews.text: I have repurchased this many times over and will continue to do so. The elf tinted moisturizer is great for every day wear. It is very affordable. I really do enjoy this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Myopia123

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Only tested it out so far but I think it's going to be great. Very light weight, slight color blends perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Teejay

customer_reviews.title: Foundation alternative
customer_reviews.text: Being older, my skin has lines and is dry. This doesn't enhance lines like most foundations I end up throwing away. Can be a bit tricky to not be splotchy if using a primer. I have to let the primer set for a long time first. Very light coverage.
customer_reviews.author: notthatcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I hve used this produce for a couple years now. I am an older woman so I don’t like to look “made up.” I use it when I want a little more coverage. It contains a 15 spf but wish it had more.
customer_reviews.author: Mssandi

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I mix this stuff with my favorite foundation to get perfect coverage that doesn't look cakey. I bought 2 at a time as I'm worried they'll expire and get weird. But if I knew they would last, I would buy a few years supply.
customer_reviews.author: MellyC

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel and look of this tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I no longer wear foundation and this is a perfect solution. Moisturizer, plus tint, is the best! No heavy, artificial look. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: MI shopper

customer_reviews.title: Product packaging was smashed and open.
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed fine but packaging (not the package it came in, the actual product box) was smashed and damaged, I was afraid to use for fear it was a retuned item.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan H.

customer_reviews.title: Too Orange
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. Too orange for me. Was hoping for just a hint of color.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I enjoy applying it
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I enjoy applying it, it lasts all day, and I don't really feel it once it is applied.
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: I like to do my face this way now that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Gentle. I do use a tinted moisturizer over top and a tiny swipe of powder on my cheeks. I like to do my face this way now that I am of a "mature" age as foundation and regular moisturizer just doesn't do the trick. Cruelty-free and ridiculously affordable. I don't know how e.l.f. does it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and coverage
customer_reviews.text: You kind of get two products for the low price of one. I really like this product. The color is really good for my skin tone and it actually has nice coverage. On the weekends, I use it rather than applying foundation. Its not a heavy coverage but maybe a light to medium coverage.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product looked like it had been opened. Didn’t have a little secure cover like previous purchases did.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Nice light coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like this tinted moisturizer better than the BB cream. It's light coverage but seems to reflect instead of settle into pores and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Inkygrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I haven't been able to find in-store anymore. Will purchase again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Product is a bit sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Product is a little sticky. Though, it does even your skin tone for though lazy days when you don’t want to do your entire makeup. You just put the moisturizer on then set it with a powder and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Linda martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very light feel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a lighter look and feel. For me I just wish it lasted a little longer but I have the same problem no matter what brand I use.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: I like this because of the neutral color and that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this because of the neutral color and that it has spf 30 and most of all it's a great price
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Way lighter than their bb cream and it came Half filed.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite when I don’t want to wear any foundation or much makeup at all! Can’t find it in stores anymore so decided to check amazon and there it was!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Haynie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The foundation is more like sunscreen with a tint rather than a SPF foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks great when applied properly
customer_reviews.text: I found that using the e.l.f. hydrating primer first then using a brush to apply the tinted moisturizer helps it look and feel even. Without the primer, this stuff dried out my face. Without the brush, (I tried a soft sponge/foam, and just with my finger) it was streaky and didn't blend evenly. For me it lasts all day especially with a setting spray. Find what works for you! I had to do some experimenting but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Ng

customer_reviews.title: Not moisture lotion at all sits on top of skin looks greasy
customer_reviews.text: Looks red on skin, I am ghostly white and the longer I had it on, the redder it got. Greasy, doesn't blend in good like lotion. It sits on top of the skin and just does not look smooth or pretty at all it was cheap or I would have sent it back. My vote is don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Jcv

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It also becomes a time crunch and convenient, since this is extended very smoothly and a certain grade can cover
customer_reviews.author: mikan

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I like to use a tinted moisturizer rather than a heavier makeup product. One problem with tinted moisturizers is that they can be too dry. This product is very good. It's moist, it smells good, it's light. it provides a smooth overall coverage, and the price is fantastic, given the expensive competition.
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth HendricksonTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great non-drying formula for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable for the price. I used Almay's tinted moisturizer for years but someone recommended this one and I love it. I have psoriasis so I suffer from very dry skin. I don't like the BB creams because of this. I use it under my bare minerals powder foundation and it is more than enough coverage. I cannot believe it is so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Halford

customer_reviews.title: Weird color
customer_reviews.text: The color ("Beige") surprised me as it is very peachy/apricot-ish -- not at all the neutral tone I was expecting. For some skin tones it might be fine, but it makes me look too much like a well-known politician. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vagabondage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light weight cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cover up that does not make me break out....that is all I want or need. The fact that I don't have to apply sunscreen as well is a big plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for a cheap tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good for a cheap tinted moisturizer. It's low on moisture though. My face feels dry after applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Bean

customer_reviews.title: e.l.f. tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for....moisturizer with a light tint. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Elf but its a little shiny..but that ok
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Darker than I expected, will possibly order lighter. ...
customer_reviews.text: Darker than I expected, will possibly order lighter. Had to mix it with lighter foundation, so not very sure how it would be on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Oxidizes
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy this. The pigment is spotty and it’s sticky and oily. Does not make the skin look good and it oxidizes a lot. I love elf but not this tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it blends in looks natural no sting
customer_reviews.author: robin oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: Like this product, but its coverage is not that great. I have lots of scars and marks from acne and this product doesn't cover them well
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for light coverage and some SPF. I will be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like the picture here
customer_reviews.text: Warning!!!!! Looks nothing like the picture here. Very very orange.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Jaminet

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely buying more of these. It was a little dark for me when I first put it on, but when I blended it out it was AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Karolyne Dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: This product was exactly what I was looking for. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for. I used to use MaryKay spf tinted moisturizer but they stopped making it. This is a comparable switch
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit dry and hard to put on evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Joy L Sayler

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Light Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver. I was searching for a product with vitamin A that did not cost a ton. My skin is so happy with it! Provides light coverage and your skin feels and looks amazing. BEST TINTED MOISTURIZER!! What a steal!!!
customer_reviews.author: MellyMel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is not a match for me. I tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: gaquilter

customer_reviews.title: Not enough moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This color is lighter than I expected and it has a yellowish base color that I don't like. It does not go on smooth and made my face look too caky. I would not recommend it if you have dry skin. I have to put it on after my regular moisturizer. I use it as a sunblock now. It has a light tint, but not enough to cover your blemishes. Overall, I wasn't happy with it and would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BeeV

product_meta.title: e.l.f. Cosmetics Tinted Moisturizer, Light Coverage, UVA/UVB SPF 20 Protection, Beige, 0.88 Fluid Ounces
product_meta.description: Reveal radiant, naturally gorgeous skin with the Tinted Moisturizer from e.l.f. Cosmetics. Our vitamin, aloe vera and cucumber enriched cream nourishes skin and provides a soft wash of color for an even-toned complexion. This cream offers SPF 20 protection and is ideal for all skin types including both dry and oily skin. Pair this moisturizer with your favorite primer to create a natural look that you'll love. e.l.f. Cosmetics offers a complete line of vegan and cruelty-free makeup and professional tools - all at an extraordinary value price, so there is sure to be something for everyone. See bullets and images for more information.
feature_bullets: REVEAL RADIANT SKIN - Our Tinted Moisturizer hydrates and soothes skin while adding a subtle wash of color for an even-toned, radiant finish.
UVA/UVB LEVEL PROTECTION - This silky BB cream keeps your skin protected from harmful sun rays by providing SPF 20 UVA/UVB level sun protection.
SKIN SOOTHING FORMULA - The hydrating formula, infused with vitamins, aloe vera and cucumber, nourishes and soothes skin for a healthy glow.
HOW TO USE - After applying your favorite e.l.f. primer, blend cream evenly over the face and neck using your fingers or a blending sponge.
VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE - Our foundations are PETA certified cruelty free and vegan, so you can feel good about using our products.
